events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred on June 9, resulting in moderate damage to the front bumper and left headlight of their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating vehicle collision and damage.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to the case to ensure timely and accurate handling of the accident claim.
The customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged and is under processing.
The customer was requested to submit a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of their driver’s license to proceed with the investigation.
All necessary documents including the police report, vehicle photos, and driver's license were submitted by the customer for claim verification.
The auto claims team has started an investigation into the details and circumstances surrounding the reported vehicle collision.
The investigation concluded that the customer’s vehicle sustained damages consistent with a rear-end collision caused by another driver.
The insurer proposed a settlement offer covering repairs to the bumper and headlight, along with rental car reimbursement during repairs.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement offer and appreciation for the quick claim processing.
Approval was granted for the settlement, confirming coverage for the full repair costs and rental assistance as outlined in the proposal.
The settlement payment was issued directly to the authorized repair shop to cover the costs of fixing the damaged vehicle parts.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that the vehicle repairs were completed satisfactorily.
